mapper.select: SELECT /* CartReaderMapper.selectData */ ordr_id, /* 주문아이디 */ ordr_date, ordr_hms, mmbr_lgn_id, aord_name, aord_prtb_tlnm, aord_ip_adrs, adrs, crtr_id, cret_dttm, amnr_id, amnd_dttm FROM DEV.TM_ORDR LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0

SELECT /* CartReaderMapper.getData */ ordr_id, /* 주문아이디 */ ordr_date, ordr_hms, mmbr_lgn_id, aord_name, aord_prtb_tlnm, aord_ip_adrs, adrs, crtr_id, cret_dttm, amnr_id, amnd_dttm FROM DEV.TM_ORDR WHERE ORDR_ID = #{ordrId}

SELECT /* CartReaderMapper.getCartList */ spbk_id , spbk_dvsn_code , spbk_kind_code , unfy_cmdt_id , unt_itm_srmb , memno , tmpr_mmbr_num , requ_qntt , end_dttm , mmbr_ys , frbe_ys , orgl_unfy_cmdt_id , cycl_code , dlvr_dw_code , ttl_dlvr_nmtm , cnrc_nmtm , brdr_bran_code , link_dvsn_code , jo_code , sctn_code , chek_ys , addt_ordr_cntt , prin_cntt , crtr_id , cret_dttm , amnr_id , amnd_dttm FROM DEV.TM_SPBK LIMIT 10 OFFSET 0
